targets.query:
SELECT sum(value)
FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("count"), 1s) AS value
  FROM "source.count"
  WHERE scenario =~ /^$scenarioName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, nodeId, instanceId
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, nodeId

SELECT sum(value)
FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("count"), 1s) AS value
  FROM "end.count"
  WHERE scenario =~ /^$scenarioName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, nodeId, instanceId
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, nodeId

SELECT sum(value)
FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("count"), 1s) AS value
  FROM "dead_end.count"
  WHERE scenario =~ /^$scenarioName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, nodeId, instanceId
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, nodeId

SELECT sum(value)
FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("count"), 1s) AS value
  FROM "error.instantRateByNode.count"
  WHERE scenario =~ /^$scenarioName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, nodeId, instanceId
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, nodeId

panels.description:
IMPORTANT. 
This metric does NOT show the overall lag on Kafka source; a largest lag among all the source partitions is shown.
panels.title: Max lag among Kafka source partitions (events)

targets.query:
SELECT sum(mean)
FROM (
  SELECT mean(value)
  FROM "service.OK.instantRate"
  WHERE scenario =~ /^$scenarioName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, serviceName, instanceId
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, serviceName

SELECT sum(mean)
FROM (
  SELECT mean(value)
  FROM "service.FAIL.instantRate"
  WHERE scenario =~ /^$scenarioName$/ AND env = '$env' AND $timeFilter
  GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, serviceName, instanceId
)
GROUP BY time($__interval), scenario, serviceName

list.name: scenarioName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "source.instantRate" WITH KEY = "scenario"

list.name: env
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "source.instantRate" WITH KEY = "env"
